sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( SYS_ID ,GRP_CD ,DTL_CD ,ACT_DATE ) AS ( SELECT '100', 'CONF', '0002', '99991231' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN COALESCE(B.REM, A.ACT_DATE) <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ACT_YN ,COALESCE(B.REM, A.ACT_DATE) ACT_DATE FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.GRP_CD = A.GRP_CD AND B.DTL_CD = A.DTL_CD

WITH T1 ( MTDG_CORP_CODE ,MTDG_METH_GUBN ,MTDG_COME_CODE ,MTDG_STND_DEGR ,MTDG_REGT_NO ,MTDG_REVI_DATE ,MTDG_APPL_DATE ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT ,MTDG_STND_FILE ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 ,MTDG_MENU_ID ,MTDG_MXML_PATH ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD ,MTDG_APPL_YN ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN ,MTDG_INIT_DATE ,MTDG_INIT_CMAN ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR ) AS ( SELECT 'K1','A','PLIJ','23' ,NULL,'20200101','20200103','23' ,NULL,NULL,'안정환','5374','한창선',NULL,'PCF30190','ui/bp/tcams/ca/plij/em-caplij-p23.html' ,NULL,'Y','20200206','ADMIN' ,'20200206','ADMIN' ,'2' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MTDG_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN A.MTDG_UPDT_DATE > B.MTDG_UPDT_DATE THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN A.MTDG_UPDT_DATE = '00000000' THEN 'D' WHEN B.MTDG_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTDG B ON B.MTDG_CORP_CODE = A.MTDG_CORP_CODE AND B.MTDG_METH_GUBN = A.MTDG_METH_GUBN AND B.MTDG_COME_CODE = A.MTDG_COME_CODE AND B.MTDG_STND_DEGR = A.MTDG_STND_DEGR

UPDATE CITBMTDG SET MTDG_REVI_DATE = #mtdg_revi_date# ,MTDG_APPL_DATE = #mtdg_appl_date# ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE = #mtdg_updt_date# ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN = #mtdg_updt_cman# WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #mtdg_corp_code# AND MTDG_METH_GUBN = #mtdg_meth_gubn# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #mtdg_come_code# AND MTDG_STND_DEGR = #mtdg_stnd_degr#
DELETE CITBMTDG WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #mtdg_corp_code# AND MTDG_METH_GUBN = #mtdg_meth_gubn# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #mtdg_come_code# AND MTDG_STND_DEGR = #mtdg_stnd_degr#
